about_the_game:
This DLC is a digital artbook, including character concepts, sketches, sprites, expressions, romantic illustrations and other game art from Demonheart: The Ice Demon.

Also included: a high-resolution digital wallpaper (2880 x 1620.)

For all those who wish to support the dev, or want a look at the sketches and concept art not published anywhere else!

  • To find the artbook, go to the folder where your game is installed and look for a folder named "DLC - Artbook"
